display_long_description:
Step into the serene universe of ZenFuse, a uniquely calming spatial puzzle experience designed to soothe the mind and challenge the intellect. In this captivating game, players are invited to navigate the complexities of a 3D cube, with the sole aim of connecting similar colors. The essence of ZenFuse lies not just in solving puzzles, but in the journey toward tranquility and mental clarity it offers. Every level offers the extra challenge to color every possible side of the cube level.

Whether you're a puzzle game aficionado or a seeker of serene gaming experiences, ZenFuse offers something unique. It's not just about reaching the solution—it's about the sense of calm and accomplishment that comes from untangling complexity. Perfect for unwinding after a long day, ZenFuse invites you to immerse yourself in a world of color, space, and tranquility.
•	Intuitive Gameplay
•	20 challenging levels
•	Hand tracking supported
•	Colorful relaxing atmosphere
